title: I fused an icon blueprint but I didnt know I can fuse a skin blueprint
body:
Hello!

I just fused the "PROJECT: Ashe first strike icon blueprient" but I didnt know I can fuse the project skin blueprint! 
Can you refund me the project cores please! It was a mistake I didnt know that  I can fuse them to unlock the skin :(
Im so sorry I did very big mistake :(

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's no way for us to refund you the cores you spend on the Icon. If you happen to open more augmented caches, you may be able to unlock the skin blueprint as well.

For a complete rundown on the event, check out our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) Let me know if you have any questions.
I did not read it all. I did a mistake. This is why I am asking RIOT to refund the project cores.

I don't think you can. Check this out: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting
If you read the whole content of this section and do the math right, you should have acknowledged about the free skin shard given to you when the amount of project core is just enough to do so.

As sorry i am for you, it will not gonna happen. It's written in FAQ that you won't get refunded either for crafting the wrong icon blueprint or any at all. We're more in the same boat.

They didn't want us to know about it anyway. I've been scrolling that disruption FAQ page and there was nowhere written ANYTHING about the phase 2. Not even the existence of the 2nd phase of event. Shame on you riot for that one. Not that i care about some skin, but it's the common sense.
